name: Scratch Model Deep Dive v3
description: Based on v1 results: Word vocab achieved best WER (0.9483). Testing word vocab variants and model improvements.
notes: Best v1 result: Word vocab WER=0.9483
High LR (1e-3) worked fine, Low LR (1e-4) was worst

experiments.name: V3-01: Word + Higher LR
experiments.description: Word vocab was best; test with higher learning rate

experiments.name: V3-02: Word + GRU Decoder
experiments.description: Combine best vocab (word) with second-best decoder (GRU)

experiments.name: V3-03: Word + Larger Model
experiments.description: Word vocab with larger hidden sizes for more capacity

experiments.name: V3-04: Word + CTC Joint Training
experiments.description: Enable CTC for better alignment learning with word vocab

experiments.name: V3-05: Char + Lower Dropout
experiments.description: Best char result (baseline) had good CER; try less regularization

experiments.name: V3-06: Word + More Epochs
experiments.description: Word vocab converged fast (5.9min vs 12min); try longer training
